text: ql -ayha alrswl- lilnaas klhm: 'iiniy rasul allah 'iilaykum jmyeana la 'iilaa baedukum dun bed, aladhi lah mulk alsmwat wal'ard wama fyhma, la ynbghy 'an takun alalwhyt walebadt 'iilaa lah jl thnawh, alqadir ealaa 'iijad alkhalq w'ifnayh wbethh, fsddaqu biallah waqrru bwhdanyth, wsddaqu birasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam alnabii alamy aladhi yumin biallah wama 'unzil 'iilayh min rabih wama 'unzil ealaa alnabiiyn min qblh, watabaeuu hdha alrswl, waltzmu aleamal bima 'amrakum bih min taeat allh, raja' 'ana twfqu 'iilaa altariq almstqym
